description: Dark burgundy or washed-out oxblood long-sleeve T-shirt in stretch cotton-spandex

core:description.text: A fitted long-sleeve T-shirt in a rich dark burgundy or washed-out oxblood tone. Made from a stretch cotton-spandex blend that moves with your body while maintaining its shape. The smooth fabric drapes comfortably and the long sleeves provide versatile coverage. The deep red hue offers a sophisticated alternative to basic neutrals.
